title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: LangChain LLM interface for chatting with any model served by a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-js on npm
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; identical API surface to the JS client.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) written in SvelteKit.

title: jmorganca/ollama-redis
summary: Example Redis vector-cache integration for Ollama embeddings; semantic search backed by Redis Stack.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into any channel.

title: ollama-cli on npm
summary: Lightweight CLI wrapper around ollama-js for quick prompts and model pulls.

title: ollama-rag on PyPI
summary: Minimal RAG toolkit that pairs Ollama embeddings with Chroma for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j – Java client
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama exposing generate, chat, embeddings and model APIs.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Experimental fork replacing GitHub Copilot backend with a local Ollama model inside Vim/Neovim.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-based Slack bot that answers threads using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST endpoints using reqwest and serde.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: One-file Streamlit app for chatting with Ollama models, including voice input via browser.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Ask Ollama” command to summarize or rewrite selected notes.
